divs: Sighting DetailsNotice what I thought was three airplanes in the sky about 3 miles up. However, they were to close together and I am certain air traffic control would not allow this to happen (I was in the Air Force). As I continued looking, the two orbs stopped and appeared stationary. It was daylight and could not possibly be stars. The plane flew onward. I could hear the plane but not the orbs. Then the orbs simply vanished straight into orbit.
trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
